page.title: 14W.Loughborough Brownie packs
page.content: There are{3}Brownie packs in this area, one at my school{Boothwood,}one at{Burleigh College}and one at{Thorpe {Acre Church.} Brownies are{girls}between the ages of {7}and{10}who meet together once a week.A meeting usually consists of games, badge work and singing.The Brownie motto is{LEND A HAND.} My mum is a Brownie leader of the Burleigh College pack.The Brownies call her{Brown Owl.}The other leader is called{Tawny Owl.}My mum has got 24 Brownies in her pack.They are divided into 4 groups named Sixes.Each Six has a title such as{Pixies,Elves,Gnomes}or {Imps.}Each six has a leader named a {Sixer.}She looks after the Brownies in her Six.I was a Brownie for 3 years but now I have moved up to{Guides because I am{11}years old.
